statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 5 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -7 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
